entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 1400 metres rising to 1700 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
